body:
Stefina,

The manual download link is at this location:

[http://dl.dropbox.com/u/16228160/GenCumulativeSky/GenCumulativeSky.exe](http://dl.dropbox.com/u/16228160/GenCumulativeSky/GenCumulativeSky.exe)

Just copy the file there to the location Abraham specified.



Mostapha,

Should we try moving the download location to app.box?  As I remember you said, app.box won't close down the link if they see too many people downloading the same file in the way that dropbox does.  I never imagined that we would be getting so many downloads of LB+HB on a single day that this could be an issue.



-Chris
